item.description:
Fairfield Library, Memorial Room (2nd Floor)

1 - 3 PM Saturday, October 3

Important Committees of Safety Meeting. They will be showing a 20 minute film in which Dr. Edwin Viera discusses Monetary Measures to introduce Sound Money to the states. We will then discuss a COS action plan to implement this in CT, together with a Q&A.

Dr. Edwin Viera has multiple degrees from Harvard, is the author of numerous works, and has won 3 landmark cases in front of the US Supreme Court.

Parking available at Bank of America, 1366 Boston Post Rd, or at Chase Bank, 1401 Post Rd.

For more info, go to www.CommitteesofSafety.org or Call 203-557-3418
item.name: Committees of Safety Meeting in Fairfield
